message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - plugily.projects.villagedefense.commands.arguments.admin.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - plugily.projects.villagedefense.commands.arguments.game.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - java.util.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.*' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.utils.Utils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.stream.Collectors' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.utils.Utils'.
